short_name.description: A short unique internal identifier for this dataset.

namespace.description: A grouping key for larger datasets or organisations.

name.description: The official name of this dataset.

description.description: A human readable description for what this dataset is.

source_name.description: The organisation responsible for publishing this data.

source_data_url.descrption: The original download URL provided by the upstream source.

access_notes.description: Any additional explanation required for how the data was accessed.
